topics.body:
Guys, quick question.

How much does a trip to the cinema costs (Popcorn and that stuff included)?
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546bbfe663687230930e0000#post_546bbfe663687230930e0000
It really depends on the theater. The closest theater to me charges, no joke, four dollars per ticket. But with the average theater you're looking at eleven dollars for the ticket and another six for snacks.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546bb675636872450b580100#post_546bb675636872450b580100
There are several plants that are very poisonus in our backyards, and we don't even know it. That's how one of my cousins lost a bunny, and puppy from of my friends, after eating some strange and common plant. 

Probably she eat something from outside, because most of the times, more if the pets are youngs, can get sick after munching and bitting something from outside the house.
